name: Brothers Apart (itch)
description:
Where am I? Brother?

You play as a kid who has been seperated from his brother from events you don't remember.

The game has a mainly platformer style but there is one short 3d part in the game.

To find out controls, press g and to hide them press h.

The controls update as you continue to play the game, so remember to check your controlls often to see if anything has changed.

Controls for the 3d part are shown in the top left corner of the screen in that part of the game.

If the screen appears black in the starting dialogue of the game where there's only dialogue visible, press enter again to start the game.

liluo.io link: https://liluo.io/unbeatablegamingbit/brothers-apart

The difficulty of the game is quite easy for the most part, it might get a little harder though at the end of the game.

A youtube video will be linked below if you are confued on what to or you just want to see me play:
